m_szDocTitle: Fed clarity won’t help to ease stock market volatility  - MarketWatch
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Fed clarity won’t help to ease stock market volatility Published: Sept 13, 2015 5:00 p.m. ET Share MARKETWATCH FRONT PAGE By Thursday, the market will have the answer to its favorite guessing game: will the Federal Reserve pull the trigger on the first interest-rate hike since 2006? But clarity on the Fed’s stance will do little to shield the stock market from further volatility. See full story.
